name: Robert David LEWIS, Respondent, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Petitioner
docket_number: Petition No. 371 Western District Allocatur Docket 1997

parties: Robert David LEWIS, Respondent, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 1st day of April, 1998, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED in accordance with this Court’s decision in Sullivan v. Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Transportation, Bureau of Driver Licensing, 550 Pa. 639, 708 A.2d 481 (1998).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Timothy P. Wile, Harrisburg, for petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
707 A.2d 1139
Robert David LEWIS, Respondent, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 1, 1998.
Timothy P. Wile, Harrisburg, for petitioner.
